name: U.A. Tagteam
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by returning 1 "U.A." monster you control to the hand except "U.A. Tagteam". If a "U.A." monster is summoned to your side of the field: you can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use this effect of "U.A. Tagteam" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): you can return 1 other "U.A." monster you control to the hand; add 1 "U.A." monster with a different name from your deck to your hand, then immediately after this effect resolves, Special Summon it.
